title: Did European monarchies have a private industry? If not, how did private citizens not in the line of nobility make money? - Quora

response.answer_text: They relied on taxes. Many thousands of non nobles made huge amounts of money through commerce before acquiring estates and nobility:jacques Coeur of France, Fuggers and Thurn und Taxis of Germany, Medici of Florence, de la Pole and Spencer and Churchill of England, Cromwell of England, de Zulueta of Spain, …. ThThe list is endless.
